Articles.Content: Floor 882: You find a Vocaloid concert and decide to stay for a few hours before heading to the next floor.
Floor 900: 100 floors away from the mythical Floor 1000 (Which I will claim like the PAge 1000 on another thread, cough cough R.I.C.
What happened to 883 thru 899?
They were boring office floors.

Ah.

Well, in that case, floor #901 is a utility floor. Just a bunch of transformers, electrical junction boxes, Air conditioning, and some big old IBM mainframe computers.
Floor 902, we are very much in space right now, the sky is mostly below us.

Floor 903: You try to open the door of 903 but its locked tight. You get out your trusty Pocket SRB and blow it up...

to discover that floor 903 was the spacewalking floor. Without air. Uh oh.
Floor 904: You stumble into a Powerpoint presentation being given by Khorne to a group of farseers.

Hype-ospray.

Or: Hype-osprey!
Floor 905: They forgot to build this one, it's just a staircase.
Floor 906: It's full of explosions and Micheal Bay, but you manage to get to the stairs before you explode.
Floor 907: Uh oh, its Darquesse. You slam the door and run for your life.
Floor 908: You encounter a Darude - Sandstorm parade. You run to the stairs and mute the sound.
Floor 909: The perfect modification, but it's locked in a Zeppelin Of Mighty Gargantuaness(TM NinjaKiwi)
Floor 910: You see Sun on his computer, bringing this thread back to life.

Floor 911: You see a bunch of people calling the police and screaming about a plane crashing into the building...

(Get it??? )
Floor 912: Wrong number!
Floor 913: A man comes in and presses every button. You're going to be late for work again.

Floor 914: You find a runway attached to the side of the tower, so that there's an airport. In a skyscraper. 914 stories up.

*mind blown*

Floor 911: You see a bunch of people calling the police and screaming about a plane crashing into the building...

(Get it??? )

Heh...how funny...and the "(Get it??? )" was so necessary...

Floor 915: You see a mug tape dispensering a meganewton's sandals. You drop what you were drinking.
Floor 916:Welcome to megaton...now lets move on to the next floor before we get radiation poisoning.

Floor 917: You cannot stop on floor 917; this floor is occupied with electromagnetic flux-pinning machinery designed to provide the building with some extra support way up here, and only authorized engineering personnel have the key to the stairwell door for this level.

Edited October 2, 2014 by GreeningGalaxy
Floor 918: welcome to the quiet ,and peaceful land that is rule by two glorious leaders.

[deleted]

Edited June 23, 2016 by mythbusters844
floor 20: you observe a crew of imperium fleet officers preparing to fire exterminus at the ground floor. you go a lot faster
